segments.text: I have read your resume.What is your last job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've worked in the Production Department for two years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you introduce your biggest accomplishments in your last job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Working with my colleagues , we were able to increase the production efficiency by 5 % .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! Could you tell me your educational background ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I got a bachelor's degree in English from Beijing University .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are you willing to work for our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can get more promotion in your company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , that's all . We'll inform you in two days .
segments.speaker: S1
